name: Ghost Scepter
description: Imbues the wielder with a ghostly presence, allowing them to evade physical damage.

abilities.name: Ghost Form
abilities.description: Turns the wielder ethereal, rendering them immune to physical damage and not attackable, but more vulnerable to magical damage, as well as disarming them.
notes: Interrupts the caster's channeling abilities upon cast
Turns the caster ethereal, disarming them, rendering them attack immune, and granting 100% physical damage resistance
Magic resistance reduction of multiple ethereal sources does not stack, the one with higher value takes priority
Stacks multiplicatively with other magic resistance sources
Reduces most heroes' magic resistance to -5%

additionalInfo: The item's attributes grant 110 health and 0.5 health regeneration
Grants 60 mana, 0.25 mana regeneration and 0.5% flat base magic resistance
Provides 5 attack speed and 0.83 main armor
Adds 5 main attack damage to all Strength/Agility/Intelligence heroes
Adds 6.75 main attack damage to universal heroes
